body:
When you know they are just going to twist the facts to fit a narrative, deciphering news sites is usually more work than it's worth.

I only visit news sites when I want to experience 4 or more web designs in less than 2 minutes. Just keep clicking links until I find the actual source. And if the source is a twitter post: fake news.
body_html:
When you know they are just going to twist the facts to fit a narrative, deciphering news sites is usually more work than it's worth.
